about_the_game:
Welcome to the abandoned planet Zombotron. This planet was once colonized by people, but after some time people abandoned and forgot about it for unknown reasons.

The main character Blaze Rush is a freelance mercenary. One day, while drifting through space in his spaceship in search of a new order, Blaze received a distress call from a mysterious planet not marked on his galactic maps and went to help. But the rescue operation failed. And now the hero will not only have to survive himself and help those in need, but also solve the mystery of the planet Zombotron.



In this action platformer you will have to fight countless different enemies: zombies, robots and other mysterious monsters. Find weapons and upgrade your skills to find and rescue survivors, and explore this mysterious planet together.

Key Features
— Well-developed destructible physical world;
— Lots of different weapons;
— You can destroy enemies using the environment;
— Various enemies with unique abilities;
— Use the gamepad and headphones for best experience.



Zombotron Re-Boot is a remaster of the original Zombotron Flash game series, with updated graphics, an improved physics engine and new, incredibly rich effects!
